1.content: First off are you a guy or a girl?
1.title: Guy or Girl?

11.content:
You bang your head against the car window after your mother went over a speed bump. "OW, what the...?"
You still thought you were in bed, guess it was a bad idea to stay up so late on a school night.

Your mom stops the car and turns around to face you "Hey Alex, were here."
Yawning and stretching your legs a bit you reach for the car door handle "have a good day love" your mom says as you step out of the car. She drives off.
"I wonder what I have first?" you keep a timetable in your locker, a bit embarrassed about not having memorized it even though you are halfway through the semester.
You head indoors and advance through the minefield of social rejects and high class students.
"What a bother that was" you whisper to yourself as you lightly leaned against your locker.

You turn your locker's dial...
You hear a few clicks and the dial gets stuck.
"Aw dammit!" You look around to see if anyone has noticed what just happened, unfortunately some people are giving you the "what an idiot" face.
You hear a locker on the left of you being slammed. The noise drew everyones attention, including the unwanted stares you got.
Your head instinctively turns left to see who caused the noise. Your eyes met with with a girl you haven't met before, you flinch and await for something to wake you up from this dream.
You wipe your eyes as the girl with the black hair walks over to you, absorbing all attention.
"Hey i'm Kate, whats your name?" the girl says in a tom-boyish tone.
You shake your head a bit "Hey, sorry my name is Kate... I mean Alex, Alex!"
Kate: "Is there something wrong with your locker?"
You: "Yea I uh, IT go stuck so I cant get it open. It happens at the odd time"
Kate: "Here, I used to have the same problem with the locker I had at my old school. Just knock it a bit here" She bangs the bottom of the lock with her fist and the locks pops off, she catches it and hand it to you.
Kate: "If you need anything else I am just..." she stops and looks at the lockers left of yours "4 lockers away from you".
You both laugh a bit and you both say your goodbyes, she walks off down the hall.

You open your locker and grab your timetable "Maths and P.E. before lunch time? Aw damn I didn't bring my P.E. gear."
After slipping your math books into your backpack, you take a quick look inside your locker again and find a watch with a sort of note attached.
You take it out and examine it. You turn it around and read the note:

"Hello Stranger, This item is you hold is old for me and new for you, we dont know each other yet but maybe someday we will become friends.
I dont know if this will be in good hands but I send this off with my best wishes, this wrist band has the ability to morph, swap and change bodies with anybody.
There are different conditions that must be met for this to work.
Here are the instructions for this item:
Place the watch on around your wrist and press the green button at the side, this will record your current age, height etc...
After that it will give your 3 options to choose from:

Clothes scanner:
This option will allow you to change separate body parts or whole body (the device will give you the option when you scan clothes)
You hover the piece('s) of clothing over the face of the watch, this piece of clothing can be from any gender or age of another person.

Contact Morph:
This option will allow you to morph separate body parts by touching them.
You must first touch the body part of any person and then touch another person anywhere and they will switch the body part of the first person you touched.

Whole Contact Swap:
This option lets you swap bodies with anyone, you can only swap yourself and not two other people.
Just touch yourself then another person with the hand you have the watch on.

You can only choose one of these and there is no turning back. Enjoy."

"This is so bizzare... but its worth a try I suppose"
You slapped the watch on after reading it and press the green button at the side, three choices come up on screen just as the note said.
11.title: Guy - Alex

111.content:
This is so bizzare... but its worth a try I suppose"
You slapped the watch on after reading it and press the green button at the side, three choices come up on screen just as the note said you can now proceed with clothes scanning. You think this is fake, but you try it any way. You decide to try it on kate because you have always wanted to wear her skirt.
111.title: Clothes scanner

112.content:
You decided "Contact Morph" and press "Contact Morph" on the watches screen.

You then decide these are the best people to try it on:

Jessica, 15, hottest freshmen in school and Lasey, 14 ugliest girl in school, always envy of Jessica.

Your Mom, 41, has huge boobs and misses being young and your sister Jennifer, 14, has a nice ass, but small boobs, wants to be older to do more things.
112.title: Contact Morph

1121.content: Which one do u choose??
1121.title: Jessica & Lasey

113.content: You decide that you want to switch bodies with someone so you place the watch on your hand and begin walking around the school. Suddenly, you are surprised when someone grabs your hand with the watch on it. It was..
113.title: Whole Contact Swap

12.content: After you have found this device you put it in your backpack carrying it on your back. Your teacher then says "Today is a exam for "How I Like Now". You realize all your stuff (binder, paper, etc.) is in your backpack but you don't want anyone to see this device. You take it out carefully when you put it back on your chair there was........
12.title: In Language Arts..

121.content: Who was the student though?
121.title: Who's The Student?

1211.content:
"Hey, what's this?" Hannah says.
"Something I found in my locker." you say.
"What's this button do?" As she presses the button.
Both of your souls are out of your bodies and going into each others.
"Woah" says Hannah (now Drew). "How come my voice sounds different.."
"Hannah I think we switch bodies." you say. "Wow your hot." As you peek down your new shirt to reveal a hot pink bra.

What now?
1211.title: Hannah (Best Friend - Hot)

info.brief_description: You are a student (guy/girl) that finds a body swap device in their locker.
info.description:
You are a student (guy/girl) that finds a body swap device in their locker and uses it somehow on other people at your school. You are 14 years old and in the 9th grade.

*Characters will be provided while going though the chapters*
